title: Unzippy
desc1: A program to help with all of your unzipping needs!
desc2: Unzippy runs in the background and scans for zip files in your downloads folder.
desc3: When one is detected you get to choose whether you want to unzip it or blacklist it.
desc4: After selecting yes you will be prompted about where to unzip it downloads, desktop, documents, pictures.

title: Color Picker
desc1: A script that lets you pick colors all over your screen.
desc2: Controls: Alt Will show what color the cursor is touching in hex format.
desc3: Alt+c Will copy the current hex code.
desc4: Alt+v Pastes the last copied hex code.

title: Camera Light
desc1: This programs purpose is to help your camera in dim or badly lit scenarios.
desc2: The program displays a warm bright border on your main monitor/screen.
desc3: Controls: type b m o d e (bmode) and the overlay will toggle on and off.
desc4: Make sure that overlay.png is always in the same folder as CameraLight.exe.
